title: Rocky Mountain Refuge
description:
Can the wild man in the mountains be tamed?
Huxley is in hiding, but from who? Why? His worst enemy is his own mind, and it has driven him to a secluded cabin in the mountains. Trust is a fickle thing. For Huxley, everything and everyone is a threat, including the nosy biologist who has threatened his peace and quiet.While closing up the final year of his grizzly bear research project, Aspen encounters a man who is as wild as the beasts he studies. An underlying sense of familiarity draws him in, and an insatiable attraction binds them together.Can Aspen tame the mountain man and discover what makes him tick?More importantly, can he unravel the mystery of Huxleyâ€™s distrust and convince him to go home?
author: Nicky James
